document_data.name: The Chained Mermaid's Grotto
document_data.mainbody: The '''Chained Mermaid's Grotto''' was an [[inn]] and [[tavern]] found in [[Yhaunn]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Services: The Grotto was not the worst set of accommodations in Yhaunn, narrowly beating out [[Reldegar's Roost]] and its company. It was an old repurposed warehouse that was damp in summer and freezing cold in winter, and managed to cost as much as a much finer inn.
